# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(Spreadsheet)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
SpreadsheetPluginInfo.C
SpreadsheetCommonPluginInfo.C
SpreadsheetAttributes.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES 
SpreadsheetPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBG_SOURCES
SpreadsheetGUIPluginInfo.C
QvisSpreadsheetPlotWindow.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)
SET(LIBG_MOC_SOURCES
QvisSpreadsheetPlotWindow.h
)
QT_WRAP_CPP(GSpreadsheetPlot LIBG_SOURCES ${LIBG_MOC_SOURCES})

SET(LIBV_SOURCES
SpreadsheetViewerPluginInfo.C
avtSpreadsheetPlot.C
avtSpreadsheetFilter.C
avtSpreadsheetRenderer.C
avtSpreadsheetRenderer_Viewer.C
avtSpreadsheetTraceRenderer.C
avtOpenGLSpreadsheetTraceRenderer.C
avtMesaSpreadsheetTraceRenderer.C
SpreadsheetViewer.C
SpreadsheetCurveViewer.C
SpreadsheetTable.C
SpreadsheetTabWidget.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)
SET(LIBV_MOC_SOURCES
SpreadsheetViewer.h
SpreadsheetCurveViewer.h
SpreadsheetTable.h
SpreadsheetTabWidget.h
)
QT_WRAP_CPP(VSpreadsheetPlot LIBV_SOURCES ${LIBV_MOC_SOURCES})

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
SpreadsheetEnginePluginInfo.C
avtSpreadsheetPlot.C
avtSpreadsheetFilter.C
avtSpreadsheetRenderer.C
avtSpreadsheetRenderer_Engine.C
avtSpreadsheetTraceRenderer.C
avtOpenGLSpreadsheetTraceRenderer.C
avtMesaSpreadsheetTraceRenderer.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)

IF (NOT WIN32)
    SET_SOURCE_FILES_PROPERTIES(avtOpenGLSpreadsheetTraceRenderer.C 
        PROPERTIES
        COMPILE_FLAGS "-I ${OPENGL_INCLUDE_DIR}"
    )
ENDIF (NOT WIN32)

SET_SOURCE_FILES_PROPERTIES(avtMesaSpreadsheetTraceRenderer.C 
    PROPERTIES
    COMPILE_FLAGS "-I ${MESA_INCLUDE_DIR}"
)
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_COMMON_INCLUDES}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/MetaData
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/SIL
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Database
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/FileWriter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Filters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/IVP
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Math
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/AbstractFilters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Data
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Pipeline
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sinks
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sources
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Plotter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/QtVisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/View
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/Colleagues
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/Interactors
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/Proxies
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/Tools
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/VisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/gui
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/viewer/main
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/viewer/proxy
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/viewer/rpc
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/winutil
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/full
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/lightweight
${QT_INCLUDE_DIR}
${QT_QTCORE_INCLUDE_DIR}
${QT_QTGUI_INCLUDE_DIR}
${VTK_INCLUDE_DIRS} 
${PYTHON_INCLUDE_PATH} 
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visitpy/visitpy 
)

SET(LIBRARY_OUTPUT_PATH ${VISIT_PLUGIN_DIR}/plots)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${QT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${MESA_LIBRARY_DIR} ${GLEW_LIBRARY_DIR} ${VTK_LIBRARY_DIRS})

ADD_LIBRARY(ISpreadsheetPlot ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ISpreadsheetPlot visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ISpreadsheetPlot)

IF(NOT VISIT_SERVER_COMPONENTS_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(GSpreadsheetPlot ${LIBG_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(GSpreadsheetPlot visitcommon gui )

    ADD_LIBRARY(VSpreadsheetPlot ${LIBV_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(VSpreadsheetPlot visitcommon viewer )
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} GSpreadsheetPlot VSpreadsheetPlot)

    IF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)
        SET(LIBS_SOURCES
            SpreadsheetScriptingPluginInfo.C
            PySpreadsheetAttributes.C
            ${COMMON_SOURCES}
        )
        ADD_LIBRARY(SSpreadsheetPlot ${LIBS_SOURCES})
        TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(SSpreadsheetPlot visitcommon visitpy ${PYTHON_LIBRARY})
        SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} SSpreadsheetPlot)
    ENDIF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)

    IF(VISIT_JAVA)
        ADD_CUSTOM_TARGET(JavaSpreadsheet ALL ${CMAKE_Java_COMPILER} ${CMAKE_Java_FLAGS} -d ${VISIT_BINARY_DIR}/java -classpath ${VISIT_BINARY_DIR}/java SpreadsheetAttributes.java)
        ADD_DEPENDENCIES(JavaSpreadsheet JavaClient)
    ENDIF(VISIT_JAVA)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_SERVER_COMPONENTS_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(ESpreadsheetPlot_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ESpreadsheetPlot_ser visitcommon avtplotter_ser avtpipeline_ser )
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ESpreadsheetPlot_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(ESpreadsheetPlot_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ESpreadsheetPlot_par visitcommon avtplotter_par avtpipeline_par )
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ESpreadsheetPlot_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_PLOT_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
